name: BLUESHOOT
description:
Ever wanted to play a first person shooter game but they seemed to violent? Well, Blueshoot may be the game for you. It is a simple minigame were you are transported into a world of blue.

Your goal: eliminate all the turquoise capsules. The more you eliminate, the higher your score, but be careful and don't let your health fall to zero.

You have an arsenal of weapons to choose from, but be wise of which you choose. There are different enemy types, with different strengths and weaknesses, and it is up to you to find them out.

Features:

  • Sprinting
  • Double Jumping
  • Wall Running
  • Powerups
